name: Eye Know: Animated Logos
description:
Guess which company's logo is getting sucked into a vortex?
Can you spot your favourite restaurant out of a hundred puzzle pieces?

We show you an animated and distorted picture and all you have to do is name the image! If you get stuck, you can either reveal more of the image, bomb away all of the extra letters, hint a letter, or ask for help by sending an animated image of your level to people on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Tumblr, Google+ or Reddit!

Download Eye Know today for free and play through over 200 animated images of company, brand and organization logos. Eye Know: Animated Logos has logos from almost any industry, including websites, retail, restaurants, insurance, computers, sports cars, magazines, banks, snacks, soft drinks, beer and movie studios. While Eye Know is appropriate for all ages, some of the content may only be recognized by an older audience and the spelling of certain words may prove difficult.

Playing Eye Know is quick, easy and fun! Play it single-player or have friends help you out! No registration is required.

Eye Know: Animated Logos is the newest version of the growing Eye Know series by Wiggles 3D. Other versions of Eye Know include Eye Know: Image FX Word Quiz for a huge variety of images, and Eye Know: Animals, for every type of animal. You can also play Eye Know in French and Spanish!

Brought to by Wiggles 3D, the creators of the Eye Know trivia board game, challenging word spelling game app Lexigo RUSH and the addictive Quote Slide word puzzle game app and online flash game.
